alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Jefferson, Lewis and eastern Oswego Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms across eastern Oswego, eastern Jefferson, and Lewis Counties, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Fort Drum, Carthage, Lowville, West Carthage, Redfield, Herrings, Highmarket, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Constantia, West Monroe, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Black River, Williamstown, Philadelphia, and Lyonsdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
